ModMetaData.name: Loading In Progress
ModMetaData.author: Smash Phil
ModMetaData.description:
Load Items and People into transporters that are already in progress.
This mod allows you to avoid canceling a load group for transport pods by editing in-progress transport groups. Forgot to load an item? Is some pawn interacting with an item that was selected, but is now unavailable? Then use this feature.
